title: First computer
subtitle: Only time I had a CRT monitor
description: My grandma gifted me one after she saw how excited I was playing Flash games on my uncle's PC. It very likely changed the trajectory of my career and life.

title: Moved to the City
subtitle: Dhaka, Bangladesh
description: From a pond to a river. I would soon learn the struggles of adapting to the crowded city life where I would have to find my identity again.

title: Won 2nd prize @ a Science Fair
subtitle: Two, actually
description: Within a space of two months, participated in two science fairs, at two different schools, in two different categories got the two (2nd) place

title: Operations Executive
subtitle: @ 10 Minute School
description: First ever job right out of high school. It involved content creation, frontend-development on WordPress as well as digital marketing and leadership.

title: Universtiy of Calgary
subtitle: Calgary, Alberta
description: From a river to the ocean. I achieved my dream of studying Computer Science but I was reminded again of the struggles of adapting to a new environment, this time on a whole different continent.

title: Marketing Director
subtitle: @ PrismA | University of Calgary
description: As an attempt to expand my network into the business side of the campus at the university, I joined this club where I designed digital content for dozens of clubs, non-profits and businesses.

title: Software Developer - Intern
subtitle: @ TC Energy
description: After building my portfolio for over 3 years of university, I got an offer on the very first interview I was invited to and I started my 16-month intership at one of the largest corporations in North America.
